page.title: 07HOME LIFE
page.content: { The houses in our area are mainly new ones but there are some old ones.The { {majority}of people own their own homes.Most people have a good selection of modern{appliances}and most have{videos,computers}and{ {televisions.}To some,the television is important but some just use it for a few programmes. Most people in the area own a{vehicle}of some sort.There is a good selection of jobs and most people have to,{travel}to work.Most people enjoy{hobbies}as a family but some prefer individual activities.Most people live in {detached houses,} although some people live in quite a variety of {buildings.}Family life seems to be very interesting in our area.
